segments.text: Hello , sir . How many in your party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just myself . What is the rate ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , a single fare is $ 50 per right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine . Do I have to show my passport ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , it's not necessary . But you have to fill out this form .
segments.speaker: S1
